mapper.insert: insert into bd_check_records (crid, checkid, ajid, pcr, pcsj, pcfs, pczt, zldj, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{crid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pcfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zldj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_check_records set checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ajid = #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcr = #{pcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcsj = #{pcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pcfs = #{pcfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pczt = #{pczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zldj = #{zldj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where crid = #{crid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select crid, checkid, ajid, pcr,date_format(pcsj, '%Y/%m/%d') pcsj, pcfs, pczt, zldj, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_records where crid = #{crid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select crid, checkid, ajid, pcr,date_format(pcsj, '%Y/%m/%d') pcsj, pcfs, pczt, zldj, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_records
